name: Nutella Chocolate Pudding
description: Treat yourself to this rich and creamy pudding made of bittersweet chocolate and nutty hazelnut-chocolate spread.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir cornstarch, sugar, cocoa, and salt in medium bowl. Heat milk in medium saucepan over medium heat until scalding. Whisk half of milk into cornstarch mixture. Return mixture to pan and cook, stirring, until mixture thickens and comes to boil.
Remove from heat and stir in chocolate, Nutella, butter, and vanilla. Chill until set, about 3 hours.
